title: panic miner.(*worker).update(0xc210074160)
body:
develop 505f1fb

maybe hard to repro, but I sent this rpc and got a panic

```
curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_sendTransaction","params":[{"from":"0x9dc2299a76b68b7ffa9e3ba0fd8cd7646d21d409", "data":"0x6005600555600f600f556010601055610100610100556110006110005562010000620100005560008060316000396031565b6000f3"}],"id":1}' http://localhost:8080
```
